properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kiza kiza kinene,
kimetanda pande zote,
sasa mimi niende wapi. x2
Ee Bwana niende wapi,
tabu zinanikabili,
nakuomba Bwana
wangu uniokoe. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mateso mengi (sana)
yananikabili mimi,
na nafsi yangu (mimi)
inaangamia Bwana;
niende wapi
Bwana niokoe.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Nakuomba Bwana (wangu)
unifikirie mimi,
uchungu mkubwa (sana)
wanidhoofisha sana;
niende wapi Bwana niokoe.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Naelemewa (Bwana)
nisafishe dhambi zangu,
usiniache (Bwana)
naangamia gizani;
niende wapi Bwana niokoe.
